name: revolve
content:

to move or cause something to move around a central point or line: The earth revolves around the sun. The gun turret revolved until the gun was aimed at the advancing soldiers. Synonym

to move in a circle or a curve around a central point, or to cause something to do this: [ T ] The plane revolved 162 degrees onto its back. [ I ] The earth revolves around the sun, roughly in a circle. [ I ] fig. His life revolves around (= He is only interested in) football.
